posts.message: My friend and Readify colleague Emad Al-Ashi talking about OAuth and OWIN in VIC.NET usergroup (Melbourne)
posts.caption: emadashi.com
posts.description: Last week I got the chance to speak on the Victoria .net user group, presenting OAuth authentication (and authentication in general) in the new .net web world of OWIN. You can find below the link to the source code, the presentation slides, and the video on Youtube.

posts.message: الصفحة اللي مشيرة الصورة دي شكلها دماغ و الله أعلم :)
posts.description:
مرسل من Assem Emam

كنا قلنا قبل كده انك على تويتر مش لازم تستنى ان الشخص يعمل لل brand بتاعك mention 
وانك لازم تكون متابع كل اللي بيتقال عنك وبتفاعل مع بعض التعليقات بشكل ايجابي 

ده أحد الأمثلة الجيدة 

شخص عادي اسمه ( محمود عبد الفتاح )كان كاتب تويته عادية جدا : صباح الخير وبسأل هل في اي كافيه قريب من فندق الفورسيزون في الجيزة بيقدم قهوة كويسه ؟

رد عليه واحد ( ضياء صلاح ) وقاله ان الفورسيزون نفسه بيقدم في قهوة كويسه جدا 

راح اكونت ( الفورسيزون ) العالمي رد عليه وشكر ضياء انه رشحله القهوة بتاعته . وعمل ريتويت للتويته بتاعت ضياء وعمل mention للفورسيزون القاهرة 

فضياء رد عليه وقاله هو بس اللي هناخده الريتويت مفيش قهوة  :)

راح اكونت ( الفورسيزون القاهرة) رد : انكم مدوعين عندنا على قهوة .

اللي عايز يشوف الحوار كامل 
http://bit.ly/1d4V9Xv

وده بوست بخصوص نفس الموضوع بس من فودافون 
http://on.fb.me/1buonbR
How many users does Snapchat have? It's not that simple - http://tcrn.ch/1jkWt6c

posts.message:
Internet is the heart of our life , there has been much hype about the “Internet of Things”.

The idea of a globally interconnected continuum of devices, objects and things .

Embedded system Development industry play an important role in shaping the Future of " Internet of Things" .

** ** **
Place: Faculty Of Engineering , Cairo University .
Hall : El-Sawi .
Time : from 3:00 Pm to 5:00 Pm .

The Event Program :
( From 3:00 Pm to 5:00 Pm )
Eng. Mahmoud sayed

- What is the "Internet of things ? "
- What do we mean by embedded system devices?
- A gentle Introduction to embedded System

** ** **

To attend this session , You have to register and receive your code .

Register @
http://foe.pitechnologies.net/index.php#register

( Don't Forget to check your mail and receive your Code )

The instructor Biography :

Eng. Mahmoud Sayed .
posts.caption: The Internet of Things( Embedded System From Scratch)
posts.description:
Internet is the heart of our life , there has been much hype about the “Internet of Things”.

The idea of a globally interconnected continuum of devices, objects and things .
  
Embedded system Development industry play an important role in shaping the Future of " Internet of Things" .
                                 
                                      **       **      ** 
Place: Faculty Of Engineering , Cairo University .
Hall : 8310 , Communication Building .
Day : Sunday 24 November.
Time : from 3:00 Pm to 5:00 Pm .

The Event  Program :
( From 3:00 Pm to 5:00 Pm )
Eng. Mahmoud Sayed

- What is the "Internet  of things ? "
- What do we mean by embedded system devices?
- A gentle  Introduction to embedded System


                                      **       **      ** 

To attend this session , You have to register and receive your code .

Register @
http://foe.pitechnologies.net/index.php#register

( Don't Forget to check your mail and receive your Code )


The instructor Biography :

Eng. Mahmoud Sayed .

Mahmoud Sayed  is Business Development Manager at PiTechnologies Inc., 

Mahmoud  current responsibilities is to  Expand the company business in Embedded system and Mobile Application across MENA region .

Mahmoud also is the technical instructor for Embedded system Development Track in faculty of computer and information FCI -Cairo university, Ain Shams university and Assiut university  as professor of practice 

Mahmoud was leading the joint supervision for the graduation projects in the following areas :

 Simulation of HSDPA / HSUPA Protocol ( High Speed Downlink / Uplink Packet Access ) .

 Simulation and implementation of ZIGBEE Protocol 802.15.4-20 .

Objects Monitor  through sensor networks nodes .


Prior to his current position, Mahmoud  worked as Senior Software Engineer at PiTechnologies .

In 2009, Mahmoud received his B.Sc. degree from Cairo University. - Faculty of Engineering - Electronics and Communication Department  

And prior to that Mahmoud was VP at CECE student activity in Cairo University


For More Information Contact us :
Tel : (+202) 3570-2367
Mob : (+20101) 747-3777
Facebook: @[168795867986:274:PiTechnologies]
Math. and Physics building (Prep. year building), First floor
Faculty of Engineering , Cairo University
